text: My darovali Lukmanu mudrost', znaniye, vernuyu rech' i skazali yemu: "Blagodari Allakha za te blaga, kotoryye On tebe daroval. Tot, kto blagodarit Allakha za Yego blaga, delayet blago sebe, a tot, kto ne blagodarit Allakha za Yego blaga, to Allakh ved' ne nuzhdayetsya v yego blagodarnosti. On zasluzhivayet khvaly, dazhe yesli nikto ne proslavlyayet Yego
